title: (x) Wells Fargo copy - Myriad {Chesh}
content:
i'm really not good with ID's, especially with Sans. If it's not Gill, they all look the same to me.... please help.   
 ![snippet](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525002318im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42282.jpg)
author: pablohoney77

comments.content: lol. i thought it was Myriad actually. i guess i should learn to trust myself a bit more.
